messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Central Command has renamed the station to "Smelly Human Station-13".

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Smelly Human Station-13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Beau Richards (Captain)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">SMELLY LIZARD NERD STARES AT THE CAPTAIN!</font>
